mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID ,A.AGENT_ID ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.GROUP_ID ,B.TITLE AS GROUP_TITLE ,B.BASIC_GROUP_YN ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y.%m.%d') AS CONVERSION_UPDATED_DATETIME ,A.CREATED_DATETIME ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATED_DATETIME FROM MEMO A LEFT JOIN MEMO_GROUP B ON A.GROUP_ID = B.ID ) AA WHERE AA.AGENT_ID = #{agentId} ORDER BY UPDATED_DATETIME DESC
